entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • runtimeconfig.json does not work with Single File App #108814
  • JIT: guarded devitalization can only handle one type #108813
    Future
  • The method returns inconsistent expected results after running it about 10,000 times #108811
    10.0.0

Closed

  • CET breaks function call evaluation while debugging on corerun #108812
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'node->AsMultiOp()->GetOperandCount() == 2' during 'Assertion prop' #106544
    10.0.0
  • remove me #108810

PullRequests

Merged

  • [mono] Updated runtime test building doc #108792
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Delete STUBLINKER_GENERATES_UNWIND_INFO #108684
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Remove the register tp and rewrite the definition of PTFF_SAVE_* in NativeAOT. #108697
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: reset reverse opts when updating HW intrinsic #108807
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Consolidate LocateNativeCompiler target #103375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix comments in AggregateException.GetBaseException() #107743
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Remove the register tp from callee saved registers in coreclr. #108696
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
